objects.text: • Premium Leather • Handcrafted Design • Cushioned Comfort

product_details.name: Artisan Comfort: Bohemian Hand-Crafted Leather Sneaker
product_details.description:
• Premium cream and tan leather construction with intricate decorative patterns
• Handcrafted scalloped design details with traditional artisanal stitching
• Comfortable cushioned sole with unique bubble tread pattern
• Breathable interior with moisture-wicking lining
• Durable rust-colored laces with brass eyelets
• Flexible and lightweight design for all-day comfort
• Perfect blend of vintage aesthetic and modern comfort
• Unique decorative toe cap with detailed embellishments
• Soft padded collar for enhanced ankle support
• Versatile style suitable for casual and boho-chic outfits

banner_details:
This banner design showcases a handcrafted leather sneaker placed centrally within a soft, layered circular frame. The background layers feature flowing gradients that evoke a warm, earthy ambiance. At the top, the prominently styled text layer **"heading"** introduces the brand message with a bold sans-serif font, while the **"subheading"** underneath adds a tagline in an elegant serif font, reinforcing the artisanal feel. The sneaker image, represented by the **"product_image"** layer, stands out boldly at the center. To the right of the product, a circular badge with the **"price"** is clearly visible. Below the main image is a features strip (**"description"**) highlighting key product benefits. A standout button (**"cta"** and **"cta_background"**) at the bottom acts as a call to action.

**Color Palette**:
- Light Cream (#FFFBF5)
- Warm Beige (#F2DDC1)
- Sand (#E8C39E)
- Earth Brown (#C19A6B)
- Terracotta (#A86A3E)
- Deep Brown (#8B4513)
- Soft Tan (#D2B48C)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a uniquely designed sneaker that combines rich earth tones with subtle gradients to create a visually compelling aesthetic. The color palette includes warm ochre (#D98942), deep burnt sienna for the laces (#A04519), creamy beige for the upper layers (#F5D8B3), and a light caramel brown for the edges and details (#C98C5F). White accents (#FFFFFF) outline the patterns and enhance the design intricacies. These colors are blended organically, using highlights and textures to create depth and focus. The dynamic color contrast ensures that each element stands out while maintaining harmony, ideal for crafting an eye-catching advertisement banner.
